response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for us. Given its exceptional quality and rarity, we believe it's worth every bit of the $800,000. However, to make this opportunity more appealing to you, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored specifically for you, considering your appreciation for high-quality products. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to welcoming you as a valued customer.", "product_price": 750000}
